column6: The Director General, Personal Tax, has overall responsibility for policy and service delivery for individual customers (including employees and pensioners), and for PAYE, Self Assessment, National Insurance, other taxes including Inheritance Tax and Capital Gains Tax, and delivery of Real Time Information.
